item.description:
A big thank you to one of our newest members, Subra, for suggesting this event. Suggestions for events are always welcomed and encouraged.

***********************************************************************************
!!!!!!!!!CHANGE OF LOCATION!!!!!!!!!!

In order to make this event more accessible to everyone, I am changing the location. I apologize for this last minute change but hopefully this should work out better for everyone.

***********************************************************************************

The plan is still to meet for dinner and then head out to the club for a fun evening of Salsa. If you are interested in attending only dinner and/or Salsa, please mention this when you RSVP so I can get a headcount for dinner.

Dinner: 6:30pm

Mantra Restaurant
52 Temple Place,
Boston, MA

Click Link: The Mantra Restaurant

Place is within walking distance to the club. Please plan to arrive by 6:30pm since we will be making reservations. Also, please plan to carry enough cash with you.

Dance: 9:00pm

Club location is changed to Mojitos Lounge at Downtown Crossing. This should be more easily accessible to everyone. The Park Street and Downtown Crossing T Stations are both nearby. For those driving into the city, you can park at the Lafayette Parking Garage and get your ticket validated at the club for reduced rates ($7-$9).

Location: 48 Winter St, Boston MA

Club has a cover of $10. Free Salsa lessons from 9:15pm-10:15pm.

Click Link: Mojitos Lounge

Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: You can find us at the restaurant at 6:30pm. I will also be sending out contact information on Friday to everyone who RSVPed for the event.
item.why: If you have never attended one of our meetups before, join us this Saturday for a fun nite out. Our members are friendly and we are always looking to make new friends! Sign up before the event is filled out...
item.name: Dinner and Salsa Nite
